title: Michael Zezas: Why ‘Slowbalization’ May Be Feeding Trade Tensions
description: Head of U.S. Public Policy Michael Zezas says that independent of current trade concerns, the trend toward globalized supply chains is fading, as companies respond both to political and market incentives.
